sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均有"把……归于"之意。
means: attribute ：指出于相信而把……归于某人或某物，含较多的客观性。
ascribe ：指根据推论或猜想把……归于某人或某物，含主观臆断成分较重。

sentence.Network_en: To ascribe opinions retrospectively is of course very dangerous.
sentence.Network_cn: 事后再翻出当初谁说了什么当然是很危险的。

sentence.Network_en: We do not ascribe a superior wisdom to government or the state.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们并不认为政府或是国家有超凡的智慧。

sentence.Network_en: I would not ascribe vice to him.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不愿意把罪过归给他.

__2013年MBA英语高频词汇_百度文库 ... ascertain 确知，探知 ascribe 归因于，归功于 aspiration 愿望，希望；渴望.
ascribe和记账有着千丝万缕的联系,从这个词竟然还能追溯到——“印象分”。...  他的意思是,当某本书或某个行为被归于(ascribe)某人名下,说明我们对其感到满意。.

list.abs: 先赋地位（英文：Ascribed status），指的是：某人所拥有的一种被事先给定的、并且通常无法被改变的社会地位。导航帮助工具其 …
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... Asch type ascribed role 赋予角色 ascribed status 赋予地位 ascription 赋属.

2010考研英语徐绽词汇笔记_秀秀nini_新浪博客... ... 共同的前缀： com- = together 常见搭配： ascribe to… Bushism 霸权主义.
Dr Goldenberg and Dr ascribe this rise to the internet ., 戈登堡博士和利维博士把这种提高归之于互联网.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Latin ascribere, from ad- 'to' + scribere 'write'

entry.def: If you ascribe an event or condition to a particular cause, you say or consider that it was caused by that thing.

example.ex: An autopsy eventually ascribed the baby's death to sudden infant death syndrome.
example.tran: 尸检最终认定孩子死于婴儿猝死综合征。

entry.tran: 认为是…的特点;认为…具有
entry.def: If you ascribe a quality to someone, you consider that they possess it.

example.ex: We do not ascribe a superior wisdom to government or the state.
example.tran: 我们并不认为政府或是国家有超凡的智慧。

entry.def: If you ascribe something such as a quotation or a work of art to someone, you say that they said it or created it.

example.ex: He mistakenly ascribes the expression 'survival of the fittest' to Charles Darwin.
example.tran: 他错误地认为“适者生存”是查尔斯·达尔文说的。

auth_sentence.content: Religious people ascribe good behavior to god's law.
auth_sentence.res_content: Religious people ascribe good behavior to god's law.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Religious people ascribe good behavior to god's law.

auth_sentence.content: You ascribe to me an opinion which I do not hold.
auth_sentence.res_content: You ascribe to me an opinion which I do not hold.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You ascribe to me an opinion which I do not hold.

auth_sentence.content: Some people ascribe this to shady motives.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some people ascribe this to shady motives.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some people ascribe this to shady motives.

con大家+scrib写+e→大家写上名字→征兵
pre预先+scrib写+e→预先写好的→规定;处方
scrib写+e→n.抄写员,作者 v.划线
sub下面+scrib写+e→在下面写上名字[签名]→订购
trans转移+scrib写+e→把写的东西移到[另一张纸上]→transcribe抄写

means.word_mean: 把…归于; 认为…是由于

sentences.en: Darren ascribed his success to luck.
sentences.cn: 达伦把他的成功归因于运气。
